dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: DeepSeek sinks stocks, Big Tech earnings, and AI for cancer: AI news roundup
News Content: Graphic: Images: Justin Sullivan, David Paul Morris/Bloomberg, Chesnot, Justin Sullivan / Staff

Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek sparked a global tech stock sell-off earlier this week that saw chip leader Nvidia lose almost $600 billion in market value — a record-setting loss for a U.S. company.

Meanwhile, investors awaited earnings results from Meta, Microsoft, and Apple.

Read about this and more in this week’s AI news roundup.

Microsoft stock falls almost 5% after modest Azure growthMicrosoft CEO Satya Nadella at OpenAI DevDay on November 6, 2023 in San Francisco, California. - Photo: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

Microsoft (MSFT) shares fell by around 5% during after-hours trading on Wednesday after it reported Azure cloud computing growth toward the bottom range of expectations.

Read More

Meta stock climbs after earnings beat on AI, smart glassesMeta CEO Mark Zuckerberg wearing Orion AR glasses during Meta Connect in Menlo Park, California on September 25, 2024. - Photo: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg (Getty Images)

Meta (META) stock climbed by around 4% in after-hours trading after chief executive Mark Zuckerberg said on the company’s earnings call that it plans to invest “hundreds of billions of dollars” in artificial intelligence infrastructure in the long term.

Read More

Alibaba says it has an AI model even better than DeepSeekAlibaba Group at Viva Technology on June 14, 2023 in Paris, France. - Photo: Chesnot (Getty Images)

Days after Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek sparked a global tech stock sell-off, a homegrown rival said its new AI model performed even better.

Read More

Microsoft thinks China’s DeepSeek might have used OpenAI’s tech before its big breakthroughIn this photo illustration, the DeepSeek app is displayed on an iPhone screen on January 27, 2025 in San Anselmo, California. - Image: Justin Sullivan / Staff (Getty Images)

Microsoft (MSFT) and OpenAI are investigating whether a group connected to the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek accessed OpenAI’s data without permission, according to a new report.

Read More

Big Tech has a big DeepSeek problemDeepSeek logo displayed on a smartphone. - Illustration: Omer Taha Cetin/Anadolu (Getty Images)

Big Tech’s multi-billion dollar spending on artificial intelligence will be under investor scrutiny this week — even more so after China’s DeepSeek sent shockwaves through Wall Street and Silicon Valley with a cheap yet competitive AI model.

Read More

The White House is looking into DeepSeek over national security concernsThe DeepSeek app is displayed on an iPhone screen on January 27, 2025 in San Anselmo, California. - Illustration: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

The White House is looking into national security concerns over the Chinese artificial intelligence app DeepSeek after its developer prompted a global tech sell-off.

Read More

DeepSeek is the ‘Temu of AI,’ analysts sayPhoto: Greg Baker/AFP (Getty Images)

After traders sold off global technology stocks en masse Monday on news of a Chinese artificial intelligence competitor, some aren’t too concerned with DeepSeek’s seemingly meteoric rise.

Read More

Trump says DeepSeek’s AI bombshell should be a ‘wake-up call’ for Big TechDonald Trump addresses the 2025 Republican Issues Conference at the Trump National Doral Miami on January 27, 2025 in Doral, Florida. - Photo: Joe Raedle (Getty Images)

The release of DeepSeek-R1, a new open-source reasoning model from a Chinese artificial intelligence startup, should be a “wake-up call” for the U.S. tech industry, President Donald Trump said.

Read More

LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman just raised $25 million to take on cancer with AIReid Hoffman, partner at Greylock Partners, during the Bloomberg Technology Summit in San Francisco, California, US, on Thursday, May 9, 2024. - Image: Bloomberg / Contributor (Getty Images)

LinkedIn (MSFT) co-founder and venture capitalist Reid Hoffman on Monday launched an AI startup aimed at discovering new treatments for cancer.

Story Continues

Read More

Big Retail is bringing out Big AI. Consumers might not even noticeNRF ‘25 Retail’s Big Show in New York on Jan. 14, 2025. - Photo: Francisco Velasquez/Quartz

AI is no longer just a buzzword in retail. It’s a tool retailers are increasingly deploying to transform their business operations.

Read More

Apple earnings are coming. Here’s what to expectApple CEO Tim Cook at the Apple Worldwide Developers Conference on June 5, 2023 in Cupertino, California. - Photo: Justin Sullivan (Getty Images)

Apple (AAPL) is expected to release its fiscal first quarter results after the market closes on Thursday.

Read More

Nvidia is doing damage control after DeepSeek’s AI advance routed the stockNvidia headquarters on February 23, 2024 in Santa Clara, California. - Photo: Andrej Sokolow/picture alliance (Getty Images)

Nvidia (NVDA) addressed its tumbling stock on Monday by saying Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek will need more of its chips for new models.

Read More

DeepSeek is limiting sign-ups after a ‘large-scale’ cyberattackDeepSeek, a Chinese artificial intelligence startup, is raising questions over the U.S.’s dominance in the field. - Image: Andrey Rudakov/Bloomberg (Getty Images)

Chinese artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek said it would temporarily limit signups after being the victim of “large-scale malicious attacks” on its servers.

Read More

Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is rattling markets. Here’s what to knowPhoto illustration of DeepSeek’s logo on a smartphone screen. - Illustration: Omer Taha Cetin/Anadolu (Getty Images)

A Chinese artificial intelligence startup is rattling Silicon Valley and Wall Street after it demonstrated AI models on par with OpenAI’s — for a fraction of the cost and energy.

Read More

For the latest news, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

View Comments

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities and the corresponding analysis by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The news highlights significant concerns in the tech sector due to a sell-off triggered by the emergence of the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has raised competition fears among major players like Apple, Microsoft, and Nvidia. With Apple set to report earnings soon, the market is likely being influenced by the broader volatility created by DeepSeek's revelations. Additionally, any potential weakness in earnings or guidance from Apple could lead to negative sentiment. Therefore, the probability of a stock price fall is elevated. Given these considerations, despite the anticipation around Apple’s earnings, the overall sentiment leaning towards risk aversion may weigh heavily, hence the probability of stock price fall is higher than that of a rise.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45, Reasoning: The news presents a mixed bag for Apple (AAPL). Several articles highlight the competitive threat posed by Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has caused broader market concerns and even a tech stock sell-off, initially a negative signal. However, Nvidia has suggested that DeepSeek will need more of Nvidia's chips, suggesting that DeepSeek's advancement is real but not detrimental to chip leaders. Meta's success indicates market appetite for AI spends. Apple is gearing up to release its fiscal first quarter results. These earnings generate uncertainty until actually released. Considering the rise of AI development (as seen with Deepseek, Meta, and others), the possibility of positive announcements from Apple is present, as they have likely built some AI strategies of their own. Given the information available, a slightly higher chance of a positive (or no) movement is indicated by the recent events. However, the market is uncertain and dependent on what actually turns out for Apple. Therefore, a slight increase is expected, if anything.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.7, Reasoning: The news focuses heavily on DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, and its impact on the tech sector.  The article mentions DeepSeek's competitive AI model causing a significant sell-off in tech stocks, including Nvidia's record-setting loss. While Apple's earnings are upcoming, the overall negative sentiment surrounding the AI landscape due to DeepSeek and the related anxieties about competition and potential national security concerns, create a cloud over the market.  While Apple's performance is not directly linked to DeepSeek, the prevailing market sentiment suggests increased risk aversion.  Considering this broader negative market sentiment, and the lack of positive news directly related to Apple, the probability of a stock price fall is higher than a rise.  The upcoming earnings announcement however might influence the stock price independently, but the overall context suggests a higher likelihood of negative price movement.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The news article discusses a broad sell-off in tech stocks triggered by developments around Chinese AI startup DeepSeek. While Apple (AAPL) is mentioned in the context of upcoming earnings, the direct impact of the news on Apple is not explicitly detailed. However, given the broader tech sell-off and investor caution around AI competition, there may be negative sentiment affecting AAPL. Additionally, Apple's earnings announcement is pending, which could lead to volatility. The lack of positive catalysts in the news suggests a neutral to slightly negative outlook for AAPL in the short term.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The news discusses the impact of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup, on the global tech stock market. It mentions that DeepSeek caused a sell-off in tech stocks, including a significant loss for Nvidia. However, the focus shifts to Apple's upcoming earnings report. Given that Microsoft and Meta have already reported their earnings with mixed results, Apple's stock might experience volatility. The overall sentiment seems cautious, but Apple's strong brand and diverse product lineup could mitigate negative impacts.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The news article discusses the impact of Chinese AI startup DeepSeek on the tech industry, including a global tech stock sell-off that affected companies like Nvidia and Microsoft. However, the article also mentions that Apple's earnings are expected to be released, and the company's performance may not be directly affected by DeepSeek's AI advancements. Given the mixed signals in the article, with some companies experiencing losses and others gaining, the probability of Apple's stock price rising or falling is uncertain. However, considering the overall negative sentiment towards Big Tech due to DeepSeek's emergence, the probability of Apple's stock price falling might be slightly higher than the probability of it rising.
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.5, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.5, Reasoning: The news about DeepSeek's AI model affecting the tech sector generally may create negative sentiment towards tech stocks, including Apple. However, Apple's strong financial position and upcoming earnings could counterbalance these broader market sentiments.
Round: 1
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The financial news highlights significant concerns in the tech sector due to the sell-off triggered by the emergence of the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek. This has caused a negative sentiment in the market, particularly impacting large players like Apple. While Apple has its earnings report upcoming, the broader negative market sentiment surrounding AI competition and the tech sector raises risk aversion. Many previous predictions suggest a prevalence of negative sentiment influenced by DeepSeek, with most analysts leaning towards a higher probability of a price drop for Apple stocks. Although there are mixed signals regarding Apple’s own performance and potential resilience, the overarching nervousness in the tech sector suggests elevated risks. Therefore, I predict a higher probability of Apple's stock price falling than rising.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4, Reasoning: The provided news paints a mixed picture. The emergence of DeepSeek and its potential impact on the AI landscape initially sparked a tech stock sell-off, negatively impacting Nvidia and creating broader anxieties about competition. This could weigh on Apple's stock. However, the news also highlights Meta's positive performance after earnings, driven by AI investments and indicating market appetite for AI development. Moreover, Apple's earnings are due, presenting the potential for positive surprises. Considering the previous round of predictions shows differing opinions and a slight lean towards stock price falling, the effect of DeepSeek and uncertainty may be diminishing. The increasing belief in the potential of Apple to leverage AI for growth is also present. Thus the stock movement trend has been reversed. Overall, given Apple's upcoming earnings, the potential to showcase AI strategy, plus the positive sentiment around AI demonstrated by Meta, the likelihood of a rise is present. However the market will be uncertain about the stock until the earnings is released. Therefore a conservative rise is expected.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The news presents a complex picture for Apple. The DeepSeek-induced sell-off in tech stocks creates a generally negative market sentiment, increasing the likelihood of a price drop for Apple even before considering its own earnings report.  However, Apple's strong brand, diverse product line, and the upcoming earnings announcement introduce significant uncertainty.  Positive earnings could easily offset the negative market sentiment.  The previous predictions range widely, suggesting substantial uncertainty in the market's reaction.  Considering the prevailing negative sentiment amplified by the DeepSeek story and the uncertainty around Apple's earnings, I lean slightly towards a higher probability of a price fall, but acknowledge the considerable chance of a price rise or even no significant movement depending on the earnings report.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The news highlights a significant sell-off in tech stocks triggered by the emergence of Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has raised competitive concerns and investor caution. While Apple's upcoming earnings report introduces uncertainty, the broader negative sentiment in the tech sector, especially around AI competition, could weigh on Apple's stock. However, Apple's strong brand and diversified revenue streams may provide some resilience. Given the mixed signals in the news and the lack of direct positive catalysts for Apple, the probability of a stock price fall is slightly higher than a rise.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The news highlights significant concerns in the tech sector due to a sell-off triggered by the emergence of the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek. However, Apple's upcoming earnings report could potentially offset some of the negative sentiment if the results are strong. Given the broader market volatility and competition fears raised by DeepSeek, there is a cautious outlook towards tech stocks, including Apple. The mixed results from other tech companies like Microsoft and Meta also suggest that Apple's stock price could experience volatility. However, considering Apple's strong brand and the potential for positive earnings surprises, the probability of a stock price rise is slightly lower than but close to that of a fall.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.48, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.52, Reasoning: The news article presents a mixed outlook for Apple (AAPL) due to the emergence of Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has caused a global tech stock sell-off. While Apple's upcoming earnings report could introduce volatility, the company's strong brand and diverse product lineup may mitigate negative impacts. Considering the overall negative sentiment towards Big Tech due to DeepSeek's emergence and the mixed results from other tech companies like Microsoft and Meta, the probability of Apple's stock price rising or falling is uncertain. However, the anticipation around Apple's earnings and the potential for positive announcements could slightly offset the negative sentiment, leading to a relatively balanced probability assessment.
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The financial news highlights significant disruptions in the tech sector due to the emergence of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup. This has led to considerable stock movements, especially negative ones for major tech companies such as Nvidia and potential spillover effects on others like Microsoft and Meta. Although the news primarily centers around DeepSeek's impact, the mixed reactions from other companies suggest a cautious market sentiment towards AI advancements and competition. Apple is set to release its earnings, adding another layer of uncertainty, as the market awaits more specific updates about their financial performance and strategy in regard to AI. Given these points and considering the previously provided predictions, the overall sentiment appears somewhat pessimistic.
Round: 2
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The emergence of DeepSeek has created significant turmoil in the tech sector, leading to a widespread stock sell-off, which is likely to impact Apple negatively as investors may exhibit risk aversion ahead of their earnings report. Although there is potential for positive earnings surprises, the prevailing sentiment surrounding AI competition and the broader tech market’s volatility introduces substantial uncertainty. Most predictions indicate a higher probability of stock price decline due to these factors, despite Apple's strong brand and some analysts highlighting the possibility of growth. Therefore, I estimate a higher probability of the stock price falling.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.42, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.58, Reasoning: The news focuses on the impact of DeepSeek on the tech market, creating an overall negative sentiment. Apple's earnings report is the key event, but the external market conditions create risk. Round 0 shows a lean towards 'fall', with predictions ranging from 0.3 to 0.55 for a rise. Round 1 sees some models adjusting upward (Gemini 2.0-flash-001 leaning towards a rise to 0.6), while others remain bearish. There's an expectation that Apple might navigate the AI competition with positive earnings, but this is not assured. Combining the negative external environment with uncertainty regarding Apple's AI strategy suggests that a cautious perspective is warranted. The slightly higher bearish sentiment (lower prediction of rising stock price in previous turn) may indicates that there are some other potential negative information about Apple's stock price that other predictors may know. Hence, the chance of the stock price falling remains higher than rising, slightly lower than the last round.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The news presents a mixed outlook for Apple. The DeepSeek-induced sell-off in tech stocks creates a generally negative market sentiment, increasing the likelihood of a price drop.  This is amplified by the uncertainty surrounding Apple's upcoming earnings report.  However, Apple's strong brand, diverse product line, and potential for positive surprises in its earnings announcement introduce significant uncertainty.  The previous predictions are quite varied, ranging from a strong belief in a price drop to a modest belief in a price increase, indicating uncertain market sentiment.  Considering the prevailing negative sentiment amplified by the DeepSeek story, the potential for negative earnings, and the overall uncertainty in the market, I assign a slightly greater probability to a price fall. However, the possibility of a price rise or even no significant change cannot be ignored, especially if Apple's earnings meet or exceed expectations. The range of previous predictions emphasizes that this situation is not easily predicted; the probability is tilted towards negative movement, but it remains relatively close to neutral.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.45, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.55, Reasoning: The news highlights a significant sell-off in tech stocks triggered by the emergence of Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has raised competitive concerns and investor caution. While Apple's upcoming earnings report introduces uncertainty, the broader negative sentiment in the tech sector, especially around AI competition, could weigh on Apple's stock. However, Apple's strong brand and diversified revenue streams may provide some resilience. Given the mixed signals in the news and the lack of direct positive catalysts for Apple, the probability of a stock price fall is slightly higher than a rise.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.42, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.58, Reasoning: The financial news highlights significant concerns in the tech sector due to the sell-off triggered by the emergence of the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek. This has caused a negative sentiment in the market, particularly impacting large players like Apple. While Apple has its earnings report upcoming, the broader negative market sentiment surrounding AI competition and the tech sector raises risk aversion. Many previous predictions suggest a prevalence of negative sentiment influenced by DeepSeek, with most analysts leaning towards a higher probability of a price drop for Apple stocks. However, Apple's strong brand and diversified revenue streams may provide some resilience. Considering the mixed signals and the uncertainty around Apple's earnings, there is a cautious outlook towards tech stocks, including Apple.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.42, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.58, Reasoning: The news highlights significant concerns in the tech sector due to the emergence of the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has caused a global tech stock sell-off. This has led to considerable stock movements, especially negative ones for major tech companies. However, Apple's upcoming earnings report introduces uncertainty and the potential for positive surprises. Considering the overall negative sentiment towards Big Tech due to DeepSeek's emergence and the mixed results from other tech companies, the probability of Apple's stock price rising or falling is uncertain. The anticipation around Apple's earnings and the potential for positive announcements could slightly offset the negative sentiment. Given the mixed signals in the news and the lack of direct positive catalysts for Apple, I predict a slightly higher probability of a stock price fall than a rise.
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.43, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.57, Reasoning: The financial news highlights significant disruptions in the tech sector due to the emergence of DeepSeek, a Chinese AI startup. This has significantly impacted companies such as Nvidia and has created concerns across the entire tech sector. Apple, as part of this sector, faces a similar risk. However, the upcoming earnings report for Apple adds an element of uncertainty because it could provide positive news that might counterbalance the negative sentiment. The various predictions from previous rounds suggest mixed sentiments, with a slight lean towards predicting a stock price fall. However, Apple's strong brand and potential earnings surprises provide some resilience against the broader negative sentiment.


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The financial news highlights significant concerns in the tech sector due to the emergence of the Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which has caused a global tech stock sell-off. This has led to considerable stock movements, especially negative ones for major tech companies like Nvidia. Apple is set to release its earnings report, which could introduce volatility. While Apple's strong brand and diversified revenue streams may provide some resilience, the overall negative sentiment towards Big Tech due to DeepSeek's emergence and the mixed results from other tech companies suggest a cautious outlook. Considering the mixed signals and the uncertainty around Apple's earnings, there is a slightly higher probability of a stock price fall than a rise.",
  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "DeepSeek sinks stocks, Big Tech earnings, and AI for cancer: AI news roundup",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.42,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.58
}
```
